entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
